## createProgressivePolicy() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Create a new progressive rule builder.

This is the main entry point for building Progressive DSL policies.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createProgressivePolicy(): ProgressiveRuleBuilder;
```
**Returns:**

[ProgressiveRuleBuilder](./change-detector-core.progressiverulebuilder.md)

A new ProgressiveRuleBuilder instance

## Example


```typescript
const policy = createProgressivePolicy()
  .intent('export removal is breaking', 'major')
  .pattern('added optional {target}', { target: 'parameter' }, 'none')
  .build('my-policy', 'patch')
```
